section.title: h5py example writing a simple NeXus data file with links
section.para: In the chapter, the figure shows a variation on the simplest possible NeXus data file, placing the measured data in the /entry/instrument/detector group. Links are made from that data to the /entry/data group. This h5py code example will show how to build an HDF5 data file with that structure. The numerical data will be taken from the previous example.
